name: Planet Wooer
description:
Experimental Project:

Attempting to make a player engaged and invested in a physics simulation using narrative via a dating sim.

You are Mars, who has loved Earth for as long as you can remember. Now is your only shot to do something about it, but another planet has some plans of its own...

Controls: 

- Mouse button to select dialogue

- Press escape to return to the main menu at any time
